name: Bù Shàngàn Bù Liànài
summary: Life is full of regrets, a belief firmly held by Li Hao, a self-proclaimed small-town test-taker. After graduating from an unknown science and engineering university, faced with the employment dilemma common among liberal arts graduates, he opted for a stalling career in logistics. Then, waking from a daydream, he heard a piece of news...
